extension.name: Citation
extension.content: Samples: [code] [citation]Citation text[/citation] [citation="Author"]Citation text[/citation] [citation="Author" src="http://www.google.it"]Citation text[/citation] [citation="[url="http://www.google.it"]Author[/url]"]Citation text[/citation] [citation author="Author" src="http://www.google.it" text="Citation text" /] [/code]
